definitions.definition: An eruption; the sudden appearance of a rash, disease, etc.
definitions.example: Any epidemic outbreak causes understandable panic.

definitions.definition: An outburst or sudden eruption, especially of violence and mischief.
definitions.example: There has been an outbreak of broken windows in the street.
There has been an outbreak of vandalism at the school.

definitions.definition: A geological layer that breaks out.
